Description:
NEAT 2 BEDROOM UNIT
This neat 2 bedroom unit would make a great addition or start to your investment portfolio. Located in a quiet complex, both bedrooms with built in robes, open plan Kitchen/Lounge, single carport with extra storage shed and a low maintenance courtyard. All this within close proximity to public transport and local shops. Currently leased at $180 per week. Potential return of $200 per week.

Description:
A Stand Alone with Style & Grace in this massive space.
Have you been looking for a home that will tick all the boxes on style space, and land then this affordable home will most certainly surprise all astute buyers. Situated on a massive 874m2 (approx.) there is clearly room for the boat, caravan or multiple cars everything fits here and all within 4 minutes to central Geelong.
This home has had one owner who has recently and lovingly renovated throughout and creatively created an amazing floorplan with thought and practicality.
The home has 3 massive living areas for the largest of families.
On entrance walk into the family room, open plan kitchen and dining room all surrounded by a unique central island bench that opens out to dining and lounge and offers a spacious central get together perfect for the kids to study without getting in the way.
The designer kitchen is simple and stylish in gloss white tones and offers a one of a kind handmade glass splash back in gorgeous copper metallic tones to compliment and highlight the room features SS appliances, D/W and jam packed with storage options this one's a dream.
The home also has one of the largest rumpus rooms and would suit the largest of modular suites or even a pool room and opens out via sliding doors to the undercover alfresco area.
The master suite is situated to the rear of the home with sliding door out to the alfresco with renovated en-suite in modern grey and white tones and a walk in robe makes this the perfect haven. All other bedrooms are to the front of the home and offer blinds, and built in robes with the main bathroom centrally located to all bedrooms and features gloss white bath and vanity with accent mocca tiling and semi frameless glass.
The rear of the home comprises of a large under cover alfresco enclosed to sides with bar area open out to a massive opened grassed area. But wait don't forget the Man Cave, this one is the best with bar area, store room or just use as a garage for 2 cars. Included additional shed for garden equipment, fully enclosed fences, gas ducted heating surrounded by landscaped gardens this one has it all.
Insights: 5 Sylvia Court, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2016 and 6 other 4 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
A Cut Above The Rest
A fabulous opportunity in a tranquil court, central to all must have amenities including Newcomb Shopping Centre, Bellarine Village, Medical Clinics, Primary and High Schools, Swim Sport & Leisure Centre and Walking Trails all moments away.
This wonderful three bedroom one bathroom property offers multiple extras both inside and out for the savvy home buyer or astute investor. With a newly renovated chef's kitchen boasting loads of storage, gas stove top and fan forced electrical oven, plus gorgeous granite bench tops servicing the connecting dining room and making serving meals a breeze. With an ample sized front living, one can kick back and relax.
Three good sized bedrooms each with built in robes, the main bathroom has been updated with new tile work and comprises a stand up shower, bath and separate toilet. Outdoor entertaining couldn't be easier with the huge under cover alfresco area, and positioned at the rear of the yard there is a four car garage which currently makes as a man cave or teen retreat. All mod cons are present including ducted heating, ceiling fans, solar panels and much more. This is an excellent opportunity to break in to the Geelong market- this neat as a pin home must be inspected. Estimated rental return $300-$330 per week (6.2% P.A approx). VENDOR SAYS SELL.

Description:
Champagne Living On A Beer Budget!
Nestled on a generous 690m2 allotment (approx), this fully renovated to the highest standard home will not disappoint.
Looking from the street, the presentation of this beautiful home is second to none. Greeted by the striking front timber fence, rendered facade, manicured and low maintenance gardens and a beautiful timber decked front portico, the introduction to this fully renovated gem sets high expectations that will be met from the moment you step inside.
Meticulously renovated this charming home boasts tiles upon entry which leads you into the modern kitchen with stainless appliances and dishwasher, formal dining with direct access to rear decked area, main bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe. 3 remaining bedrooms all with built in robes and a central bathroom with bath. Spacious family lounge with polished timber flooring, gas heating and air-conditioning round out this stunning interior.
The timber undercover outdoor area is certainly a highlight and being protected from the elements will allow you to entertain the family and friends all year round. The remote entry carport has direct access to the manicured large rear yard. Rarely will you find a property renovated to as high a standard as 183 Wilsons Road. Inspection will not disappoint!
Notable amenities within walking distance include medical centres, Aldi, Safeway, Schools, childcare centres, splashdown aquatic centre, public transport and is a short drive to the City Centre (CBD) and Surf Coast.
Insights: 183 Wilsons Road, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2016 and 6 other 4 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
A Stylish and feature packed Home in Blue Chip Pocket
Have you been looking for a stylish and solid family home in a highly sought after pocket? Then look no further. This family home has been meticulously cared for without a thing out of place. On entrance be impressed with the front low maintenance and secure yard.
To the front of the home sits the family lounge room with large light filled windows with privacy blinds and block out blinds, gas heating and split system to create all round comfort in crisp modern colours throughout.
The open plan kitchen and dining room is spacious enough for the whole family and offers gas cooking, double sink, and under bench cupboards overlooking the dining and breakfast bar. With sliding glass doors out to the rear yard.
The master bedroom has dual robes, privacy and block out blinds and opens into the two way central bathroom offering a functional room in clean neutral tones with bath, vanity, and shower.
The home has two additional bedrooms to the rear of the home, both with built in robes and blinds.
The outside has something for everyone with a massive 4 car garage, and entertainment area surrounded by a lush open backyard with low maintenance gardens, rear access via double side gates perfect for the tradesman or the entertainer nothing to do here move in and unpack.

Description:
Supersize Me
This renovated 2 bedroom unit with a massive backyard outshines the competition in the area and represents amazing value to the first home buyer or investor. With nothing left to spend you can sit back and enjoy the labour of others’. Polished boards, fully renovated kitchen and bathroom, gas heat, reverse cycle cassette air-conditioning and off street parking make this unit comfortable, practical, homely and stylish. Also setting this apart from all others is the massive back yard with ample room for children, entertaining and pets giving you that townhouse feeling on a unit budget. Conveniently located close to bus routes, schools, Newcomb Central and Bellarine Village, you now have the opportunity to secure the lifestyle you have been looking for in the heart of 3219. Don’t hesitate – inspection of this home should be a priority this weekend.

Description:
Great Value Investment or 1st Home
On a corner allotment and in great condition this property would make for a very affordable first home or valuable addition to the investment portfolio. The location is convenient with public transport at your door step and plenty of amenities within walking distance including, schools, shops, medical centres, reserves, the Men's Shed and Splashdown.
The home is recently renovated, well maintained and comprises 2 bedrooms (master can be divided into 2 to create a third), central bathroom, open kitchen /dining, living room, separate laundry and more. The kitchen has 900mm oven, pantry and DW. Gas heating, ceiling fans and reverse cycle air conditioning control the climate, while a team of solar panels power the house making the energy bill near non-existent.
Opening from the living and the Kitchen, a large undercover deck is perfect for entertaining and includes cafe blinds to make this space usable all year round. Also included in this area is a full wall of storage cupboards.
The tradesman will be in heaven with a 10m x 4m shed and a triple car port. Established gardens with water tanks irrigated to the garden beds, fruit trees and a veggie patch complete the home.
To take advantage of a fantastic opportunity to secure this home in great condition at a very affordable price, call Dion today to book an inspection.
Insights: 165 Solar Drive, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2016 and 6 other 2 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
More than meets the eye!
The classic facade of this Federation weatherboard property conceals an expansive four bedroom, two bathroom home future-proofed by a hefty 4.5 kilowatt solar array and a 2,100 litre rainwater tank. Split system air conditioning, efficient gas heating and ceiling fans plus newly installed continuous gas hot water offer modern comfort and convenience amid the timeless appeal of the heritage features and immaculate paintwork.
The extended and updated kitchen adjoins north-facing living and dining to create a spacious social hub. Stone benches house an impressive 900mm stainless steel Whirlpool oven and five burner gas cooktop, with a generous pantry and plenty of cupboards for ample storage. A large wood heater in the living/dining area banishes winter chill while you snuggle up for cosy downtime with your favourite people.
Space-saving built-in robes keep the bedrooms clutter-free and the roomy master is graced with a well-fitted en suite and big, wide window to the back garden. The light-filled lounge features a surround sound system and sliding door yard access.
The central bathroom includes shower, vanity, bath and heat lamp, with separate toilet across the hall. The large laundry comes with a wall of cupboard storage.
Outside, relax with a quiet cuppa in the sheltered alfresco area while children and pets enjoy the secure garden. A shed and roof storage offer space for tools and other necessities and a double lock up garage, carport and driveway provide off-street parking for up to 5 cars.
Ten minutes from central Geelong and within walking distance of schools, shops and the Rail Trail, this home is a Federation gem! Don't miss your chance to snap up this future-proofed home
Sam Edwards : 0498 427 939

Description:
Huge Allotment With Unlimited Potential
Buzzing with unlimited potential this versatile property on a huge 798 sqm (approx.) block lends itself to the whole gamut of property development, from renovation and extension to subdivision and total redevelopment (STCA).
With such a substantial allotment to play with, developers will be keen to wipe the slate clean and construct a complex of up to three townhouses to either sell or keep as an instant investment portfolio (STCA). Home improvers with dreams of a big and comfortable home should put this home at the top of their list: the solid exterior offers a canvas of brick, while interiors are midway through renovation, with the bones in place for an easy transformation into a modern family home. The floorplan provides two family-sized living/dining areas, one with direct access to the back garden, and the other large enough to accommodate a study nook. The kitchen has new cabinets and timber benchtops and is now ready for the addition of appliances and other finishing touches. The master bedroom has twin built-in robes and en suite style access to the shared bathroom. The bathroom is almost complete with stone tops, new vanity, and a semi-frameless shower giving you an accurate picture of the fresh and modern space that this room will become. The 2nd bedroom is simply huge- perfect as a shared bedroom for two or more children. However, it would be very easy to add a dividing wall and separate this airy room into two private bedrooms (STCA). Mod cons include SS-AC and a wall heater.
Outside, you'll be floored by the sheer space on offer! There's ample room to accommodate several residences to the rear (STCA). However, if subdivision doesn't interest you, you'll be pleased to know that even with the addition of a hefty extension and grand Tradie's shed, there'll still be an extremely generous garden for the kids (STCA). Some work has already been completed towards a large carport or alfresco. The drive-through single lock-up garage provides secure parking, with the wide driveway on hand for additional vehicles.
This family-friendly location provides easy access to everything that matters including major shops and Secondary schooling in Newcomb, local primary schools, PT, and the Bellarine Highway. So, whatever your agenda- from renovation to redevelopment- this potential-packed property is your oyster (STCA).
Act quickly to make it yours!
- This HUGE allotment has virtually unlimited potential for subdivision & development (STCA)
- Wipe the slate clean & capitalise on this large block with up to 3 townhouses (STCA)
- Extensive renovations are mid-way, with the home ready for your finishing touches (STCA)
- Spacious floorplan provides 2 living areas that promote comfortable family living
- Save on time: the kitchen & bath both feature new benchtops & cabinetry
- The vast 2nd bed could be easily divided to provide 2 bedrooms for the kids
Land: 798 sq m approx.

Description:
SOLID INVESTMENT OR FANTASTIC FIRST HOME
This Solid brick renovated 2bd, 1bath spacious unit in a quiet block of 7 would suit a first home buyer, student, keen investor, downsizer or young couple.
Nestled between Regent and Truscott streets with undercover parking and easy entry via Truscott Street, you will find this wonderful spacious unit which has its own private courtyard.
Featuring an open lounge room with abundance of natural light and beech floating floorboards. The good size kitchen is a modern colour palette and offers electric cooking, ample cupboard storage and room for a small meals table.
The updated bathroom offers a shower over bath, modern vanity and separate toilet. Plus a large space to house your Washer and dryer.
The 2 generous size bedrooms with BIR are light n bright, with one bedroom having a leafy outlook to the garden.
Outdoor you will find a generous courtyard which includes a garden shed, good size entertaining area and is fully screened for privacy.
Ideally located only minutes from Newcomb and Bellarine Village Shopping Centre's, a short drive to East Geelong shops, Geelong CBD, Gordon Tafe and just a 5 minute walk to the bus stop service to Deakin University.
* Electric HWS
* AC / Heat Split system
* Rent $250 pw
* Quiet Street

Description:
Look no further
Situated only five mins from Geelong CBD, 10 mins to coastal areas, and walking distance to local shops and schools, public transport and Gordon Tafe, this home is sure to appeal to both owner occupiers and investors.
This is the first time this home has been offered for sale since it was built in 1971. Comprising formal lounge with a gas heater, kitchen/dining with electric oven. There are 3 bedrooms each with built in robes. The bathroom offers a separate bath and shower and separate toilet.
Extras include infiniti hot water service, water temperature regulator, alarm system, evaporative cooling.
Outdoors is a 1 garage and large lawn area. Allotment approx. 638sqm. The large land size also makes this potentially suitable for developers aswell.
Put this one on your list to inspect as soon as possible. Offered at an extremely affordable price, this home won't be for sale for very long.

Attention Downsizers & Investors!
Set in a quite court location, this quality built architecturally designed unit is close to public transport, schools, shopping and medical facilities. This unit comprises of 2 spacious bedrooms with wall-to-wall carpet and BIRs, central bathroom with bath and separate shower including a separate toilet. The open plan dining & kitchen area has a great use of natural light with the kitchen featuring plenty of cupboard space, Technika stainless steel appliances and a Bellissimo stainless steel dishwasher. Gas ducted heating throughout will keep you warm in these cooler months. Featuring a single remote controlled lock-up garage with internal access into the laundry, security doors and locks on windows the property is safe and secure. Outside is your very own private courtyard with its own sun shade so you can enjoy the outdoors. With a rental return of approx. $260-$280 pw this is a great property so be quick.

Description:
Ideal for Investment or First Home Opportunity
This neatly presented home located close to public transport and within walking distance of Newcomb Shopping Centre and local facilities is presented for immediate leasing or purchase and move in while you make improvements to make it your own. Features include large open plan living adjacent to the dining area and kitchen with ample storage, three bedrooms with robes, bathroom with separate toilet and full size laundry. A secure roller door leads to a large covered carport and verandah that extends the width of the home providing ample private undercover entertaining areas. The carport leads to the large secure garage and workshop. The allotment is 597m2 (approx) and the gardens are established and neatly presented. Previously let at $300 per week, this property will perform well in this highly affordable price range while it increases in value over time.

Description:
SURE TO IMPRESS
Here is a great opportunity to secure this solid 3 bedroom family home or investment opportunity with heaps of extras. As you enter the property into the slated tiled entrance you be impressed with the good sized lounge room with ceiling fans, split system heating and cooling and ducted heating throughout the home. With a good sized timber kitchen and meals area, family bathroom and 3 good sized bedrooms, master with BIR and roller shutters on all windows at the front of the property for your comfort and added security. With a double carport and great sized garage and workshop and plenty of additional shedding for all your storage needs. With a huge covered entertaining area for all those summer family bbqs, leading out to a tree lined leafy secure back yard on a good sized allotment of 562sm(approx.) and located close to schools, shopping centres, public transport , sporting facilities and only a short drive to CBD.
Photo ID Required

Description:
Walk to shops from attractive unit
Looking for a homely unit to live in or invest, this 1 bedroom unit is sure to entice. Set in a quiet, secure block of units in Whittington, the lovely residence is just a short walk to the shopping precinct of Bellarine Highway. The home offers privacy, restful living areas and low maintenance surrounds ensuring an easy lifestyle.
The spacious living room features ceiling fans, gas heating and air conditioning, and the large well-equipped kitchen caters adequately for those who enjoy cooking with ample bench space and cupboards. Built-in robes are offered in the bedroom and with a good sized bathroom separate w/c and laundry. An outdoor area serves as a handy spot for quiet time or casual dining with visitors.
The comfortable, appealing unit is neat and tidy at every turn. Complete with single garage simply move in today and relish the good life.

Description:
Move in or Rent Out
In a quiet court location sonly metres from East Geelong Primary school, Gordon TAFE and St Albans Recreation Reserve sits this neat and modern townhouse. Consisting of 2 bedrooms open plan living, central bathroom and secure garage. There is a generous backyard and an undercover outdoor area to this low maintenance yet spacious townhouse.
